data.title: Patwar Hourly Pay Rate
data.meta_description: How much does a Patwar employee salary on average per hour? Explore the company details, job salaries, location differences, and salary reviews.
data.text:
View salary at Patwar by Job Title BETA

The average salary of Patwar jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the hourly salary range of different positions at Patwar. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. Director of Maintenance jobs at Patwar earn the most with an average hourly salary of $95, while General Laborer jobs earn the least with an average hourly salary of $18.

The estimate average salary for Patwar employees is around $34 per hour. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $38. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employeeâ€™s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.

Bus Maintenance Instructor $19 - $25 $22 Patwar Bus Operator $22 - $30 $26 Patwar Director of Maintenance $75 - $115 $95 Patwar Maintenance Supervisor $34 - $47 $41 Patwar

DISCLAIMER: The salary range presented here is an estimation that has been derived from our proprietary algorithm. It should be noted that this range does not originate from the company's factual payroll records or survey data.
